title: (x) Mighty Healthy New York multiple FONT ID's - Varsity Script, LHF Full Block, similar to Dispatch {Justin K, Florian}
content:
Looking for an ID on any of the fonts used in this flyer. Many thanks for any of your help!!!

-Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228074507im_/http:/typophile.com/files/splash_6003.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [splash.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228074507/http:/typophile.com/files/splash_0.jpg) | 106.2 KB |
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Mighty Healthy is varsity script from veer  
date at top is LHF full block (free on their site)  
condensed type looks like it could be a tweaked LHF full block by hand/rounded out (a la Grotesk, which this flyers designer clearly took some pretty heavy handed cues from)

‘New York’ looks like [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228074507/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/dispatch/?testdrive=custom%3D37994%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DNEW%2520YORK%26size%3D44%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3DFFFFFF%26w%3D720%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26dock%3Dfalse%26seed%3D27?refby=mfde) with thickened serifs/horizontals.
